data.title: Homepage
data.text:
About us

IAG GBS (Global Business Services) is part of International Airlines Group (IAG), one of the world’s leading airline groups, and the parent company of airline brands including British Airways, Iberia, Vueling, Aer Lingus, and LEVEL.

IAG’s business model is unique. It is based on a light structure at the centre, with agile, empowered, and focused airline operating companies accountable for results, and a central platform providing a competitive advantage through scale and world-class expertise.

As a key part of this central platform, we drive innovation, efficiency and simplicity across finance, procurement, technology, airline services, and group-wide systems across IAG.

We are a knowledge-creation organisation, and we enable the Group to be at the forefront of innovation and sustainability, driving the future of the aviation industry.
